author: Kelsie Gibson
title: Robin Hood Is Already the Best Part of Once Upon a Time's Midseason Premiere
text:
Once Upon a Time Season 6 Midseason Premiere Pictures Robin Hood Is Already the Best Part of Once Upon a Time's Midseason Premiere February 3, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 Robin Hood Is Already the Best Part of Once Upon a Time's Midseason Premiere 
Once Upon a Time returns in nearly a month, and we already have a sweet glimpse of what's to come. Now that Emma and Regina are stuck in the Wish Realm, they are bound to run into a few familiar faces — and the nostalgia is almost too much for us to handle. Not only does August Booth (aka Pinocchio) make a special appearance, but everyone's favorite bandit, Robin Hood, is also back in action and looking as gorgeous as ever. Here's hoping the gang can find a way to bring him back to Storybrooke , because we definitely aren't over his untimely death from last season . While Regina is reuniting with her true love, Belle and Rumple are having a family reunion of their own as their son Gideon returns to cause chaos ( and potentially kill Emma ). Relish all the magical moments ahead! Related:
